ADS.AD_EXPLAINER_BUTTON: Why am I seeing this ad?

AD_EXPLAINER_DIALOG.MESSAGE: In order to use wago.io as an addon provider and help support authors for their hard work on your favorite addons we are required to show this advertisement. If you do not want to see this ad, you can always disable Wago as a provider in the options tab.
AD_EXPLAINER_DIALOG.TITLE: Why am I seeing this ad?

{url}

WOWUP_UPDATE.INSTALL_MESSAGE: Do you want to restart WowUp and install the update?
WOWUP_UPDATE.NOT_AVAILABLE: Latest version of WowUp is already installed
WOWUP_UPDATE.PORTABLE_DOWNLOAD_MESSAGE:
Do you want to manually download the latest portable version?

You will need to close the app manually and copy over the new version.
WOWUP_UPDATE.SNACKBAR_TEXT: A new version of WowUp is available

ADDON_STATE.UNAVAILABLE_TOOLTIP: This author or provider has made this addon unavailable

ADDON_WARNING.GENERIC_DESCRIPTION: We have detected an issue with this addon. We are no longer able to update this addon or provide details.
ADDON_WARNING.GENERIC_TOOLTIP: We have detected an issue with this addon
ADDON_WARNING.MISSING_ON_PROVIDER_DESCRIPTION:
{providerName} did not return the addon when we requested it.
We are no longer able to update this addon or provide details until {providerName} fixes it.
ADDON_WARNING.MISSING_ON_PROVIDER_TOOLTIP: {providerName} is not returning this addon as expected
ADDON_WARNING.NO_PROVIDER_FILES_DESCRIPTION:
{providerName} properly returned this addon, however, it did not have any files matching this game version.
Once there is an update matching this game version this warning should go away.
ADDON_WARNING.NO_PROVIDER_FILES_TOOLTIP: {providerName} did not have any matching game version files
ADDON_WARNING.TOC_NAME_MISMATCH_DESCRIPTION: This addon's folder name did not match with the expected toc file, you may experience issues with this addon in-game.
ADDON_WARNING.TOC_NAME_MISMATCH_TOOLTIP: This addon's folder does not match the toc

ERRORS.ACCOUNT_PUSH_TOGGLE_FAILED_ERROR: Failed to toggle instant updates for your account. Please try again later, or reach out on Discord.
ERRORS.ADDON_INSTALL_ERROR: Failed to install addon, {addonName}. Please try again later.
ERRORS.ADDON_SCAN_ERROR: An error occurred matching your addon folders with {providerName}, please try again later.
ERRORS.ADDON_SYNC_ERROR: An error occurred checking for updates from {providerName}, please try again later.
ERRORS.ADDON_SYNC_FULL_ERROR: [{installationName}]: An error occurred checking for updates to {addonName} from {providerName}, please try again later.
ERRORS.CHANGE_PROVIDER_ERROR: Failed to change provider for {addonName} to {providerName}
ERRORS.GITHUB_LIMIT_ERROR:
You have reached your GitHub API limit of {max} requests.
Please wait until {reset} and try again.
ERRORS.GITHUB_REPOSITORY_FETCH_ERROR:
Failed to check updates for {addonName}.
Please verify that the repository is correct or set this addon to be ignored.

ADDON_DETAILS.DEPENDENCY_TEXT: This addon has {dependencyCount} required {dependencyCount, plural, =1{dependency} other{dependencies}}

CURSE_MIGRATION.MESSAGE:
The CurseForge API has been shutdown so WowUp can no longer fetch addon information from it.
Unfortunately, this means that the CurseForge provider has been removed and your addons from CurseForge will no longer be updated.
It is recommended that you perform a re-scan in order to see what addons can be found on other providers.
The Re-Scan process may take a while.
Read more here.
CURSE_MIGRATION.RE_SCAN_ERROR: The automatic Re-Scan failed, please try again manually.
CURSE_MIGRATION.RE_SCAN_SUCCESS: The automatic Re-Scan has finished you're ready to go.
CURSE_MIGRATION.TITLE: CurseForge Migration

ERRORS.ADDON_NOT_FOUND: No addon was found for the protocol: {protocol}
ERRORS.NO_VALID_WOW_INSTALLATIONS: No WoW client installed for protocol: {protocol}

INSTALL_FROM_URL.DESCRIPTION: If you want to install an addon directly from a URL paste it below to get started.

ERROR.ASSET_NOT_FOUND:
No asset was found to download {message}.

A valid zip file is required to be in the release in order for WowUp to download it.
ERROR.BURNING_CRUSADE_ASSET_NOT_FOUND:
No asset was found to download from {message}.

A valid zip file ending with '-bc' is required in order for WowUp to download it.
ERROR.CLASSIC_ASSET_NOT_FOUND:
No asset was found to download from {message}.

A valid zip file ending with '-classic' is required in order for WowUp to download it.
ERROR.FAILED_TO_CONNECT: Cannot connect to API, please wait a bit and try again.
ERROR.INSTALL_FAILED:
Something went wrong when trying to install the addon, please try again.

If this message keeps showing up, you can get help on Discord in the #wowup-support channel.
ERROR.INVALID_URL:
The given value is not a valid URL. Examples of valid addon URLs are:
	- https://github.com/WowUp/WowUp.Addon
	- https://www.wowinterface.com/downloads/info25610-8.3-014.html
	- https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/altoholic
ERROR.NO_ADDON_FOUND:
No addon was found, make sure your URL is pointing to the correct page.

When installing from github, please make sure the repository has a release tag with a zip archive containing the addon.
ERROR.NO_RELEASE_FOUND:
No releases were found for {message}.

Valid release with zip file assets are required for WowUp to download it.
ERROR.TITLE: Addon Installation Failed
ERROR.WRATH_ASSET_NOT_FOUND:
No asset was found to download from {message}.

A valid zip file ending with '-wrath' is required in order for WowUp to download it.

INSTALL_FROM_URL.IMPORT_ASSET_WARNING:
We were unable to verify if the latest release of this addon is compatible with your selected client.

But we did find a zip file "{zipName}".

Install at your own risk.
INSTALL_FROM_URL.TITLE: Install Addon URL

MY_ADDONS.ADDON_IS_CODE_REPOSITORY: Addon appears to be a code repository

PAGE_CONTEXT_FOOTER.VIEW_GITHUB: Check out the code on GitHub
PAGE_CONTEXT_FOOTER.VIEW_GUIDE: Check out our guide to see what WowUp can do

MY_ADDONS.RESCAN_FOLDERS_BUTTON_TOOLTIP: Scan your client folder for installed addons
MY_ADDONS.RESCAN_FOLDERS_CONFIRMATION_DESCRIPTION:
Doing a re-scan will attempt to guess which addons you currently have installed, doing so may reset known addon information. Use this function when certain addons are not recognized or addon versions are not being shown correctly. This scan will never delete your installed addons, only what WowUp knows about them.

Scanning may take a few moments.

UNINSTALL_POPUP.CONFIRMATION_ACTION_EXPLANATION: Removing an addon via WowUp will remove the selected addon from your interface/addons directory. The character settings for this addon will not be removed.
UNINSTALL_POPUP.CONFIRMATION_LESS_THAN_THREE: Are you sure you want to remove the following {count} addons?
UNINSTALL_POPUP.CONFIRMATION_MORE_THAN_THREE: Are you sure you want to remove the selected {count} addons?
UNINSTALL_POPUP.CONFIRMATION_ONE: Are you sure you want to remove {addonName}?
UNINSTALL_POPUP.DEPENDENCY_MESSAGE: {addonName} has {dependencyCount} {dependencyCount, plural, =1{dependency} other{dependencies}}. Do you want to remove them also?
UNINSTALL_POPUP.TITLE: Uninstall {count, plural, =1{Addon} other{Addons}}?

MY_ADDONS.UNKNOWN_ADDON_INFO_TOOLTIP: The installed addon did not match with any of the configured providers
MY_ADDONS.UPDATE_ALL_BUTTON_TOOLTIP: Update all addons for this client

CURSE_FORGE_V2.API_KEY_DESCRIPTION: If you have requested a CurseForge API key you can input it here to connect to their API.

ENABLED_PROVIDERS.DESCRIPTION: Select which providers may be used to search for, and install new addons

GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN.MESSAGE: A personal access token will increase the amount of GitHub API calls you can make, it is freely available. Learn More
GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN.TITLE: GitHub Personal Access Token

WAGO_ACCESS_KEY.MESSAGE: Use the Wago provider without seeing advertisements. Learn More

APPLICATION.APP_RELEASE_CHANNEL_CONFIRMATION_DESCRIP:
Switching to the Beta channel will allow you to receive experimental builds that contain bug fixes, as well as new and upcoming features. You may only go back to the current stable version by uninstalling your existing app and re-installing from wowup.io.

While the Beta channel is functional, use at your own risk.
Switching to the Stable channel for the app will prevent you from receiving more Beta builds, the next update will be the next Stable release.
APPLICATION.APP_RELEASE_CHANNEL_DESCRIPTION: Toggle between the Beta and Stable releases of the application
APPLICATION.CURSE_PROTOCOL_DESCRIPTION: When downloading addons from the CurseForge website, WowUp will handle the install
APPLICATION.ENABLE_APP_BADGE_DESCRIPTION: Show a badge on the app icon with the number of addons with available updates.
APPLICATION.ENABLE_SYSTEM_NOTIFICATIONS_DESCRIPTION: Enable various system notification popups, such as auto updated addons.
APPLICATION.KEEP_LAST_OPENED_TAB_DESCRIPTION: When opening an addon detail page, automatically select the last opened tab
APPLICATION.MINIMIZE_ON_CLOSE_DESCRIPTION_MAC: When closing the WowUp window, minimize to the menu bar.
APPLICATION.MINIMIZE_ON_CLOSE_DESCRIPTION_WINDOWS: When closing the WowUp window, minimize to the taskbar notification area.
APPLICATION.PROTOCOL_DESCRIPTION: WowUp will register a custom URI protocol in your system and handle its incoming inquiries
APPLICATION.SCALE_DESCRIPTION: Change zoom factor for entire app.
APPLICATION.SET_LANGUAGE_CONFIRMATION_DESCRIPTION: Changing the default language requires the application to restart.
APPLICATION.SET_LANGUAGE_DESCRIPTION: Select a language to change to
APPLICATION.START_MINIMIZED_DESCRIPTION: WowUp will start minimized and not show up.
APPLICATION.START_WITH_SYSTEM_DESCRIPTION: WowUp will be started automatically when you start up your system.
APPLICATION.TELEMETRY_DESCRIPTION: Help improve WowUp by sending anonymous install data and/or errors.
APPLICATION.THEME_DESCRIPTION: Change the color theme to whatever you like
APPLICATION.TITLE: Application
APPLICATION.USE_CURSE_PROTOCOL_CONFIRMATION_DESCRIPT: WowUp can set itself as the default handler for CurseForge download links. This may cause issues if you try to use the CurseForge app, are you sure you want to continue?
APPLICATION.USE_HARDWARE_ACCELERATION_DESCRIPTION:
Disabling hardware acceleration might solve FPS issues and fix other rendering issues in this app.
Changing this setting requires a restart.
APPLICATION.USE_HARDWARE_ACCELERATION_DISABLE_CONFIR: Disabling hardware acceleration requires the application to restart.
APPLICATION.USE_HARDWARE_ACCELERATION_ENABLE_CONFIRM: Enabling hardware acceleration requires the application to restart.
APPLICATION.USE_SYMLINK_SUPPORT_CONFIRMATION_DESCRIP: Enabling symlink support will allow WowUp to recognize symlinks when performing a re-scan. Warning: If you do not know what a symlink is, you do not need this. When updating symlinks will currently be replaced with an actual folder and the link lost.
APPLICATION.USE_SYMLINK_SUPPORT_DESCRIPTION: Allow WowUp to scan symlink folders in your addon folder. Warning: they will be replaced when updating/installing.

DEBUG.CONFIG_FILES_DESCRIPTION: Open the folder where for example your addons.json and preferences.json are stored.
DEBUG.DEBUG_DATA_DESCRIPTION: Log debug data to help with diagnosing potential issues. This can be found in your latest log file for the curious.
DEBUG.LOG_FILES_DESCRIPTION: Open the folder that contains your last couple of log files.
DEBUG.TITLE: Debug

WOW.AUTO_UPDATE_DESCRIPTION: All existing and newly installed addons will be set to auto update by default
WOW.IS_HIDDEN_DESCRIPTION: Hide this client in the pages My Addons and Get Addons

CLEAR_INSTALL_LOCATION_DIALOG.MESSAGE:
Are you sure you want to remove the installation at "{location}"? This will remove all stored addon information for this client.

Your addon folders will not be removed.
CLEAR_INSTALL_LOCATION_DIALOG.TITLE: Remove World of Warcraft Installation?

WOW.TITLE: World of Warcraft

APPLY_CONFIRMATION.MESSAGE:
Are you sure you want to apply this backup to your interface settings?

Make sure that the World of Warcraft game is not running before you apply a backup.

This operation cannot be undone.
APPLY_CONFIRMATION.TITLE: Apply WTF Backup?

DELETE_CONFIRMATION.MESSAGE:
Are you sure you want to delete backup {name}?
This cannot be undone.
DELETE_CONFIRMATION.TITLE: Delete WTF Backup?
